title: lucasjansen1980
author: lucasjansen1980
content: 📣📣📣                  📣📣📣Dear Catena Community Users,The moment we've all been eagerly awaiting has arrived! We are thrilled and proud to announce the official rerun of the CATENA Chain. The Catena Chain is now fully active and operational on the project's 8 nodes, marking a significant milestone in our journey. To explore the power of the Catena Chain, we invite you to visit our dedicated Explorer website at: https://catenascan.com/Exciting developments are on the horizon! We are excited to share that the dates for the Delegated/Validators and the initiation of the Catena Bridge will be officially announced on June 21st, 2023. Stay tuned for these important updates.⚡️ Exciting news awaits our users! Head over to Twitter and comment on the Mainnet's rerun announcement tweet using the following hashtags along with your wallet address: #CATENA $CMCX "your wallet address." The first 50 users who participate will receive an initial transfer of "5000 CMCX" coins on the mainnet.TOGETHER WE GROWCATENA Explore:https://catenascan.com/Twitter:https://twitter.com/Catena_NetworkTelegram:https://t.me/CatenaOfficialCMCX CoinCATENA Network

comments.author: lucasjansen1980
comments.body: So whether you're a developer, investor, or enthusiast, Catena Mainnet is a blockchain platform that is definitely worth checking out.catenascan.com
